alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Central and Southern Scott County; Faulkner; Garland; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Northern Scott County; Perry; Polk County Lower Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 30 at 9:04AM CST until February 01 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...A couple of rounds of light snow, sleet, and light freezing rain are expected. Precipitation should mainly occur today through this evening, and again on Tuesday into Tuesday night. Ice accurals between a quarter to a half inch are possible, with snow and sleet accumulations less than a half inch. * WHERE...Western into Central Arkansas. * WHEN...From noon today to 9 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. Be sure to check road conditions before traveling in these areas. Visit the Arkansas Department of Transportation`s website Idrivearkansas.com for the latest road and traffic conditions.
